content: I wish* that employers listed salaries post-tax like they do in some countries. Saying “I make $70,000" for example is clearer and feels better than “I make $100,000 but never see $30,000 of it so I really make $70,000 but I’m going to budget as if and tell people I’m making $100,000 and tax is just a giant expense.” *that taxes were much lower and flat but that’s another conversation for another day
